variants.Description in input context: A53T mutation in alpha-synuclein associated with Parkinson's disease

Material used.Material Name: Differentiated SH-SY5Y cells overexpressing WT or A53T R-syn and control cells
Material used.Description: Mitochondria were prepared from differentiated SH-SY5Y cells overexpressing wild-type (WT) or A53T alpha-synuclein (R-syn) and control cells.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Altered mitochondrial protein expression and function
Readout description.Result Description: A53T mutation caused significant changes in mitochondrial protein expression compared to WT and control cells.

Biological replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Technical replicates.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic positive control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Basic negative control.Description: Not explicitly mentioned in the literature.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA and t-tests were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression within 80-120% of control levels

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression <50% or >150% of control levels

Material used.Material Name: Differentiated SH-SY5Y cells overexpressing WT or A53T R-syn
Material used.Description: Western blot confirmed altered expression of specific mitochondrial proteins in A53T-overexpressing cells.

Readout description.Molecular Effect: Altered expression of key mitochondrial proteins
Readout description.Result Description: Western blot confirmed significant changes in mitochondrial protein levels in A53T-overexpressing cells.
